page.title: 18LIFE IN ASHDON 1985
page.content: To find what present day life is like in the parish,pupils of Ashdon School devised a questionaire which was delivered to 260 houses in our survey area.145 completed forms were later collected and analysed.This is the result of the survey. AV. NO. OF ADULTS IN EACH HOME. 2 AV. NO. OF YRS. LIVING IN ASHDON. 26 AV. NO. OF YRS. FAMILY IN ASHDON. 37 NO. OF PEOPLE OVER 65 YEARS OF AGE 68 PEOPLE MOVED INTO ASHDON FOR : (a) work in the area. 36 (b) retirement. 10 (c) proximity to main line rly. stn.11 (d) house was available. 47 (e) other reasons. 40 NO. OF RESIDENTS OWNING CARS (82%) 119 NO. USING BUS SERVICE REGULARLY(24%)35 NO. CONSIDER BUS SERVICE : (a) satisfactory (29%) 42 (b) unsatisfactory (47%) 69
